caption: AI Model
description: The AI Model object describes the characteristics of an AI/ML model for security event correlation and threat assessment. Examples include language models like GPT-4, embedding models like text-embedding-ada-002, and computer vision models like CLIP.
name: ai_model

model_name.description: Human-readable model name. For example: gpt-4o, claude-3-sonnet, or text-embedding-ada-002.

ai_provider.description: AI service provider or organization name. For example: OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, or Internal.

version.description: Model version identifier. For example: 2024-05-13, v2.1.0, or beta.

references.description: OWASP AI Security and Privacy Guide
MITRE ATLAS - Adversarial Threat Landscape for AI Systems
